title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 823/85 of 27 March 1985 fixing the flat-rate production aid and the guide price for certain dried fodder products for the period 1 April to 14 April 1985
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 823/85
of 27 March 1985
fixing the flat-rate production aid and the guide price for certain dried fodder products for the period 1 April to 14 April 1985
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the period 1 to 14 April 1985 the flat-rate production aid provided for in Article 3 of Regulation (EEC) No 1117/78 shall be 8,41 ECU per tonne for the products referred to in Article 1 (b) and (c) of the said Regulation.

For the period 1 to 14 April 1985 the guide price for the products referred to in the first indent of Article 1 (b) of Regulation (EEC) No 1117/78 shall be 177,15 ECU per tonne.
This price refers to a product with:
- a moisture content of 11 %,
- a total gross protein content of 18 % of the dry weight.

For the period 1 to 14 April 1985 the percentages to be used to calculate the supplementary aid referred to in Article 5 of Regulation (EEC) No 1117/78 shall be:
- 100 % for the products referred to in the first indent of Article 1 (b) and (c) of the said Regulation,
- 50 % for the products referred to in the second indent of Article 1 (b) of the said Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 April 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 March 1985.
For the Council
The President
F. M. PANDOLFI
